Whats wrong with PB torrent links?

Strange, I never had any problems with PB, anyone experiences the same?
just click OK on empty window, it will download. it is not about TPB. it is ACTA etc shit :P

I understand what it is now, and still cannot use the link - empty window is empty window. This is supposed to DL from torrent client, but I use rtorrent from terminal - not a wide spread way of "torrenting", so I have to patch my rtorrent in order to use TPB - I really didn't expect this from the home guys. Don't feel like patching now, need torrents quickly, so disappointedly I must halt TPB usage for a while. Feel awful about it
